name: [ PHASE I: GENESIS PASS ] by XPLORIUS

metadata.description: XPLORIUS is a community of dreamers, travellers & adventure seekers building meaningful connections in web3 & IRL. “Phase I: Genesis Pass” is our first drop made of 3,333 NFTs. Owning this pass means that you’re the ultimate OG (& VIP) within our ecosystem with priority access to all of the future endeavors.
